item.title: 'Not going to be doing it for long': Trump fires ominous warning to Colombia
item.description: <p>In his comments made to reporters aboard Air Force One, Trump said Venezuela was sick and needed US support, adding, &quot;Colombia&#x27;s very sick too.&quot; </p>

item.title: Comedy trio Sooshi Mango call for harsher laws after CCTV captures man breaking into office
item.description: <p>Australian comedy trio Sooshi Mango has revealed their Melbourne office was broken into overnight, posting CCTV footage of the intruder in a bid to find him.</p>

item.title: World leaders react with condemnation and caution after US captures Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro
item.description: <p>World leaders have responded with a mixture of condemnation and caution after US President Donald Trump captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro and wife Cilia Flores.</p>

item.title: Police hunt trio of suspects after multiple bricks hurled into traffic in Melbourne
item.description: <p>Five cars travelling about 80km/h were damaged when large bricks hit their windscreens, with two vehicles needing to be towed from the scene.</p>
